Pypot Quickstart¶

Installation¶

python -m pip install pypot

Running¶

Installing as Debian package¶

get the ‘.deb’ from github releases page, and run:

sudo apkg -i pypot-1.0.0.deb

then enable the service with:

sudo systemctl enable pypot

Config defaults to ‘/etc/pypot.ini’. Logs will be available in ‘/var/log/pypot.log’. Source Code ———–

https://github.com/beth/Pypot

Documentation¶

https://pypot.rtfd.io

pypot
